wmndsLinkProps.name: contentText
wmndsLinkProps.description: Required. Specifies the content that will be part of the link. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

wmndsLinkProps.name: contentHTML
wmndsLinkProps.description: Required. Uses HTML to specifies what content is going to be linked.

wmndsLinkProps.name: link
wmndsLinkProps.description: Required. Specifies the URL of the page the link goes to.

wmndsLinkProps.name: linkTitle
wmndsLinkProps.description: Required. The link title attribute gives additional information about the page being linked to.

wmndsLinkProps.name: linkTarget
wmndsLinkProps.description: Specifies where to open the linked document. Defaults to _self that means it opens in the same tab.

wmndsLinkProps.name: classes
wmndsLinkProps.description: Specifies what class modifiers to apply to link component.

wmndsLinkProps.name: isBackLink
wmndsLinkProps.description: If true, it will overwrite text and show the standard back link. Defaults to false.

wmndsLinkProps.name: withChevronLeft
wmndsLinkProps.description: If true, the link will display an chevron left before the text. Defaults to false.

wmndsLinkProps.name: withChevronRight
wmndsLinkProps.description: If true, the link will display an chevron left after the text. Defaults to false.
